rptData.sql:
select a.* from ( select to_char(kmdm_jk) kmdm,b.mc kmmc,sum(rlj_jk) rlj,sum(ylj_jk) ylj,sum(nlj_jk) nlj,to_char(kmdm_jk) id from YSSR y,bm_yskm b where y.kmdm_jk=b.bm and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}% group by to_char(kmdm_jk),b.mc
union select substr(kmdm_jk,1,7) kmdm,b.mc kmmc,sum(rlj_jk) rlj,sum(ylj_jk) ylj,sum(nlj_jk) nlj,substr(kmdm_jk,1,7) id from YSSR y,(select substr(bm,2,7) bm,mc from bm_yskm_zl) b where substr(kmdm_jk,1,7)=bm and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}% group by substr(kmdm_jk,1,7),b.mc
union select substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) kmdm,b.mc kmmc,sum(rlj_jk) rlj,sum(ylj_jk) ylj,sum(nlj_jk) nlj,substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) id from YSSR y,bm_yskm_dl b where substr(kmdm_jk,1,5)=substr(b.bm,2,5) and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}% group by substr(kmdm_jk,1,5),b.mc
union select substr(kmdm_jk,1,3) kmdm, decode(substr(kmdm_jk,1,3),'101','税收税入','102','基金收入','103','非税收入','110','转移性收入') kmmc, sum(rlj_jk) rlj,sum(ylj_jk) ylj,sum(nlj_jk) nlj,substr(kmdm_jk,1,3) from YSSR where zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}% group by substr(kmdm_jk,1,3)
union select '','一般预算收入合计',sum(case when kmdm_jk like '103%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then rlj_jk when kmdm_jk not like '103%' and substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) not in('10101','10104') then rlj_jk when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then rlj_jk*4 when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then rlj_jk*2.5 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 end) as vrlj , sum(case when kmdm_jk like '103%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then ylj_jk when kmdm_jk not like '103%' and substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) not in('10101','10104') then ylj_jk when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then ylj_jk*4 when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then ylj_jk*2.5 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 end) as vylj, sum(case when kmdm_jk like '103%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then nlj_jk when kmdm_jk not like '103%' and substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) not in('10101','10104') then nlj_jk when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then nlj_jk*4 when kmdm_jk like '10101%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk in ('4','5') then nlj_jk*2.5 when kmdm_jk like '10104%' and ysjc_jk not in ('4','5') then 0 end) as vnlj ,'999999990' as id from yssr where substr(kmdm_jk,1,3) not in ('102','110') and substr(kmdm_jk,1,5) not in ('10301','10116') and substr(kmdm_jk,1,7) not in ('1010103','1010203','1010922','1010442','1010443') and kmdm_jk not in ('101060101') and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}%
union select '','社会保险基金预算收入合计',sum(rlj_jk) as vrlj ,sum(ylj_jk) as vylj,sum(nlj_jk) as vnlj ,'999999991' as id from yssr where substr(kmdm_jk,1,3)='102' and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}%
union select '','其他基金预算收入合计',sum(rlj_jk) as vrlj ,sum(ylj_jk) as vylj,sum(nlj_jk) as vnlj ,'999999992' as id from yssr where substr(kmdm_jk,1,5)='10301' and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}%
union select '','转移性收入合计',sum(rlj_jk) as vrlj ,sum(ylj_jk) as vylj,sum(nlj_jk) as vnlj ,'999999993' as id from yssr where substr(kmdm_jk,1,3)='110' and zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}%
union select '' kmdm, '合计' kmmc, sum(rlj_jk) rlj,sum(ylj_jk) ylj,sum(nlj_jk) nlj,'999999995' as id from YSSR where zwrq_jk={pa_zwrq} and jgdm_jk like {pa_jgdm}% and ysjc_jk like {pa_ysjc}%
) a order by id
